statements: SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT course_id, lecture_notes FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT course_id, slides FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT course_id, quizzes FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT lecture_notes, slides FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT lecture_notes, quizzes FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT slides, quizzes FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_notes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT slides FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT quizzes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id > 1;
SELECT lecture_notes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id > 1;
SELECT slides FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id > 1;
SELECT quizzes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id > 1;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1 LIMIT 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_notes, slides FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id > 5 AND course_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_notes LIKE '%important%';
SELECT course_id, quizzes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE quizzes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_notes IS NOT NULL AND slides IS NULL;
SELECT course_id, lecture_notes, slides FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_notes <> '' OR slides <> '';
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id IN (3, 7, 11);
SELECT course_id, lecture_notes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_notes LIKE '%summary%' OR lecture_notes LIKE '%conclusion%';
SELECT course_id, slides FROM CourseMaterials WHERE LENGTH(slides) < 1000;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT course_id, quizzes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE LENGTH(quizzes) > 500;
SELECT lecture_notes, slides, quizzes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_notes LIKE '%lecture%' AND slides IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_id, lecture_notes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_notes NOT LIKE '%detail%';
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 15 AND lecture_notes IS NOT NULL AND slides IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_id, quizzes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_notes LIKE '%chapter%' AND slides LIKE '%overview%';
SELECT course_id, quizzes FROM CourseMaterials WHERE quizzes LIKE '%test%' AND quizzes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_id, slides FROM CourseMaterials WHERE quizzes = 'final';
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_notes <> '' AND quizzes <> '';
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT title, content FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT id, title, author FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT * FROM Quiz;
SELECT question, answer FROM Quiz;
SELECT id, question, difficulty FROM Quiz;
SELECT author, created_at FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT id, difficulty, created_at FROM Quiz;
SELECT id, title, content, author FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Quiz WHERE difficulty='Easy';
SELECT id, title, content FROM LectureNotes WHERE author='Jane Smith';
SELECT id, question, answer FROM Quiz WHERE difficulty='Medium';
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quiz ORDER BY difficulty;
SELECT id, title FROM LectureNotes WHERE title LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM Quiz WHERE answer='Yes';
SELECT id, title, created_at FROM LectureNotes WHERE author='Alice';
SELECT id, question, difficulty FROM Quiz ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title, author FROM LectureNotes WHERE author LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT id, title, author FROM LectureNotes WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, question, answer FROM Quiz WHERE difficulty = 'Easy';
SELECT MAX(id) FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT id, title, author, created_at FROM LectureNotes ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT id, title, author, created_at FROM LectureNotes WHERE author IN ('John Doe', 'Jane Smith');
SELECT id, question, answer, difficulty FROM Quiz ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, content FROM LectureNotes WHERE content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) FROM LectureNotes GROUP BY author;
SELECT id, title, author, created_at FROM LectureNotes WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, author, COUNT(*) FROM LectureNotes GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, title, author FROM LectureNotes WHERE title LIKE '%Introduction%' AND author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, question, difficulty FROM Quiz WHERE answer IS NULL;
SELECT author, AVG(LENGTH(content)) AS avg_content_length FROM LectureNotes GROUP BY author;
SELECT id, author, created_at FROM LectureNotes UNION SELECT id, 'Anonymous' AS author, created_at FROM LectureNotes WHERE author = '';
SELECT author, MAX(created_at) AS latest_note_created FROM LectureNotes GROUP BY author;
SELECT id, author, created_at FROM LectureNotes UNION SELECT id, 'Anonymous' AS author, created_at FROM LectureNotes WHERE author = 'Unknown';
SELECT * FROM lecture_notes;
SELECT id, title FROM slides;
SELECT course_id, question, options FROM quizzes;
SELECT * FROM lecture_notes WHERE course_id = 123;
SELECT course_id, title FROM lecture_notes WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT course_id, question FROM quizzes WHERE correct_answer = 1;
SELECT * FROM slides WHERE course_id = 456 AND slide_number = 5;
SELECT id, title FROM lecture_notes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT course_id, slide_number, image_url FROM slides WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM quizzes ORDER BY created_at ASC, course_id;
SELECT course_id, question, correct_answer FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = 789;
SELECT id, title FROM lecture_notes WHERE content ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT course_id, slide_number FROM slides WHERE course_id = 456 AND slide_number BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT course_id, title FROM lecture_notes WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, slide_number FROM slides WHERE course_id = 456 ORDER BY slide_number DESC;
SELECT course_id, question, options FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = 789 AND options->'A' ILIKE '%option%';
SELECT * FROM lecture_notes WHERE id = 123 OR id = 456;
SELECT course_id, title, content FROM lecture_notes WHERE content LIKE '%database%' AND course_id = 789;
SELECT course_id, slide_number, image_url FROM slides WHERE created_at < '2022-03-15';
SELECT course_id, question, correct_answer FROM quizzes WHERE created_at > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT id, course_id, title, created_at FROM lecture_notes WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lecture_notes WHERE title ILIKE '%database%';
SELECT course_id, AVG(correct_answer) AS avg_correct_answer FROM quizzes GROUP BY course_id HAVING AVG(correct_answer) > 2;
SELECT id, course_id, slide_number, image_url FROM slides WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY slide_number ASC;
SELECT id, question, options FROM quizzes WHERE correct_answer = 3;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS num_quizzes FROM quizzes GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY num_quizzes DESC;
SELECT id, course_id, title, created_at FROM lecture_notes WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, course_id, title FROM lecture_notes WHERE id IN (SELECT course_id FROM quizzes WHERE correct_answer = 1);
SELECT course_id, AVG(correct_answer) AS avg_correct_answer FROM quizzes GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY avg_correct_answer DESC;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS num_slides FROM slides GROUP BY course_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT id, course_id, title, content FROM lecture_notes WHERE content ILIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT course_id, AVG(DATE_PART('day', created_at)) AS avg_days_created FROM lecture_notes GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT course_id, SUM(correct_answer) AS total_correct_answers FROM quizzes GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY total_correct_answers DESC;
SELECT id, question, jsonb_array_elements_text(options) AS option FROM quizzes WHERE correct_answer = 1;
SELECT id, course_id, title, created_at FROM lecture_notes WHERE EXTRACT(month FROM created_at) = 6;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE correct_answer = 1) AS num_correct_answers FROM quizzes GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(DISTINCT slide_number) AS num_unique_slides FROM slides GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT id, course_id, title FROM lecture_notes WHERE id = (SELECT course_id FROM slides WHERE slide_number = 1);
SELECT course_id, MAX(correct_answer) AS max_correct_answer FROM quizzes GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT id, course_id, title, content FROM lecture_notes WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT * FROM courses;

SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_title FROM materials;
SELECT material_id, material_title FROM materials WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT lecture_notes.note_id, lecture_notes.note_content, courses.course_name FROM lecture_notes JOIN courses ON lecture_notes.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT slide_id, slide_title, courses.course_name FROM slides JOIN courses ON slides.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_questions, courses.course_name FROM quizzes JOIN courses ON quizzes.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT course_id, course_name, material_title FROM courses LEFT JOIN materials ON courses.course_id = materials.course_id;
SELECT course_id, course_name, material_title FROM courses RIGHT JOIN materials ON courses.course_id = materials.course_id;

SELECT lecture_notes.note_title, slides.slide_title, quizzes.quiz_title FROM lecture_notes, slides, quizzes WHERE lecture_notes.course_id = slides.course_id AND slides.course_id = quizzes.course_id AND quizzes.course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lecture_notes WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT note_title, note_content FROM lecture_notes WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM slides WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT slide_title, slide_content FROM slides WHERE course_id = 4;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = 6;
SELECT quiz_title, quiz_questions, quiz_answers FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = 7;
SELECT material_type, material_title FROM materials WHERE course_id = 8;
SELECT * FROM lecture_notes ln INNER JOIN courses c ON ln.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM slides s INNER JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM quizzes q INNER JOIN courses c ON q.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM materials m INNER JOIN courses c ON m.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM lecture_notes ln LEFT JOIN courses c ON ln.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM slides s LEFT JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM quizzes q LEFT JOIN courses c ON q.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM materials m LEFT JOIN courses c ON m.course_id = c.course_id;

SELECT ln.note_title, s.slide_title, q.quiz_title, m.material_title FROM lecture_notes ln, slides s, quizzes q, materials m WHERE ln.course_id = 1 AND s.course_id = 1 AND q.course_id = 1 AND m.course_id = 1;

SELECT ln.note_title, s.slide_title, c.course_name, m.material_type FROM lecture_notes ln, slides s, courses c, materials m WHERE ln.course_id = 2 AND s.course_id = 2 AND c.course_id = 2 AND m.course_id = 2;
SELECT ln.note_content, q.quiz_questions, m.material_content FROM lecture_notes ln, quizzes q, materials m WHERE ln.course_id = 3 AND q.course_id = 3 AND m.course_id = 3;

SELECT ln.note_title, s.slide_title, q.quiz_title, c.course_description FROM lecture_notes ln, slides s, quizzes q, courses c WHERE ln.course_id = 4 AND s.course_id = 4 AND q.course_id = 4 AND c.course_id = 4;
